name: 王泰典
objective: This course introduces the basic concepts of engineering survey,
schedule:
W01 (9/19) : Introduction
W02 (9/26) : Units and observational error
W03 (10/3) : Cooridnation and global navigation satellite system (1/2)
W04 (10/10) : Vacation
W05 (10/17) : Cooridnation and global navigation satellite system- exercise (2/2)
W06 (10/24) : Leveling and exercise
W07 (10/31) : Distance measurement and exercise
W08 (11/7) : Buffer
W09 (11/14) : Angle observations (1/2)
W10 (11/21) : Angle observations-exercise (2/2)
W11 (11/28) : Buffer
W11 (12/5) : Transversing (1/3)
W12 (12/12) : Transversing-exercise (2/3)
W13 (12/19) : Transversing-exercise (3/3)
W14 (12/26) : Construction survey (1/3)
W15 (1/2) : Construction survey-erercise (2/3)
W16 (1/3) : Construction survey-erercise 3(2/3)
W17 (1/10) : Buffer
W18 (1/17) : Final
materials: Ghilani CD, PR. Wolf (2011): Elementay Surveying-an introduction of geomatics, 13th edites.
